title: Natural Standard Database Access Restored
author: Kegel; Deborah
description: Access to the Natural Standard database on integrative medicine was not available for UCSD users in April and much of May due to licensing and renewal problems. CDL/UCSF licensing efforts have concluded and we now have access again. Thank you for your patience. The new site is https://naturalmedicines.therapeuticresearch.com/ Additional resources for natural product medicine include...
cleaned_text: Access to the [Natural Standard database on integrative medicine](https://lib.ucsd.edu/catalog) was not available for UCSD users in April and much of May due to licensing and renewal problems. CDL/UCSF licensing efforts have concluded and we now have access again. Thank you for your patience. The new site is [https://naturalmedicines.therapeuticresearch.com/](https://naturalmedicines.therapeuticresearch.com/) Additional resources for natural product medicine include the following: [Natural Medicines Comprehensive Database](https://naturalmedicines.therapeuticresearch.com/) A comprehensive database of natural products, herbals and nutraceuticals, including proprietary combinations on the market. It is particularly useful for identifying the components of multiple-ingredient products. [Drugs, Supplements, and Herbal Information](https://medlineplus.gov/druginformation.html) Info on Dietary Supplements and Herbs. On Medline Plus from NLM. [National Center for Complementary and Alternative Medicine (NCCAM)](https://www.nccih.nih.gov/) Herbs at Glances, Safety, and more useful resources from this NIH center.
